snippet: A Federal racketeering indictment unsealed today charged 22 members and associates of a powerful prison-based gang with murders, assaults, extortion and narcotics trafficking.   "This indictment and the arrests will significantly disable one of Ca...
lead_paragraph: A Federal racketeering indictment unsealed today charged 22 members and associates of a powerful prison-based gang with murders, assaults, extortion and narcotics trafficking. "This indictment and the arrests will significantly disable one of California's most violent gangs," said Nora M. Manella, the United States Attorney who announced the Federal grand jury's indictment of figures associated with the gang known as the Mexican Mafia.

headline.main: Federal Indictment Accuses 22 In Mexican Mafia Investigation
